query: WITH entities AS (SELECT credit_facility_id, id FROM interest_accruals WHERE ((credit_facility_id = $1) AND (COALESCE(id > $3, true))) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: InterestAccrualId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN interest_accrual_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
